item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, March 15, 2025 at 8:15 PM UTC
item.description:

25. Athena landed in a dark crater where the temperature was -280° F / -173° C (210 points | 238 comments)

27. Kerning, the Hard Way (214 points | 63 comments)
28. Why do transit agencies keep falling for the hydrogen bus myth? (253 points | 411 comments)
29. Decrypting encrypted files from Akira ransomware using a bunch of GPUs (229 points | 50 comments)
30. I'm Peter Roberts, immigration attorney who does work for YC and startups. AMA (270 points | 414 comments)
